reviewText: If you have any interest in how things work and ancient history, this series will hold you spellbound!  I watch these shows every time I can catch them on the tube!  I just wish Nova would release the super-cool  episode about the researching and building of two historically correct  catapults going up against a painstakingly recreated castle wall.  That  show was done in Scotland and is the best one yet, I feel.
